definition: Name of the plot

Organization in charge of plot monitoring (IRSTEA: National Research Institute of Science and Technology for Environment and Agriculture;  ONF: National Forest Service; PNVanoise: Vanoise National Park)
Type of management (MAN: managed forest ; UNM: unmanaged forest)
Year of the first census
Number of census
Area of the plot
Minimum value of the local x-axis
Maximum value of the local x-axis
Minimum value of the local y-axis
Maximum value of the local y-axis
Elevation a.s.l.
Plot location precision. GPS: differential gps measurement in the field ;  MAP: estimation of the position on a 1/25000 map
x coordinate of the center of the plot (RGF93 EPSG 2154)
y coordinate of the center of the plot (RGF93 EPSG 2154)
local x coordinate of the reference point for elevation (z=0)
local y coordinate of the reference point for elevation (z=0)
Latitude of the center of the plot (WGS84 EPSG 4326)
Longitude of the center of the plot (WGS84 EPSG 4326)
Slope of the plot extracted from a DEM (IGN 25m)
Aspect of the plot extracted from a DEM (IGN 25m)
Mean annual temperature extracted from worldclim
Mean total annual precipitation extracted from worldclim
Bedrock type extracted from BRGM France map
